biolockj.module.report

Class Email

  • java.lang.Object
    • biolockj.module.BioModuleImpl
      • biolockj.module.report.Email
  • All Implemented Interfaces:
    BioModule, Comparable<BioModule>

    public class Email
extends BioModuleImpl
implements BioModule
    This BioModule is used to email the user the pipeline execution status and summary. If run on cluster, an scp command is included in the email that can be run to download analysis from the cluster.
    GUI Module Name
    Email

    • Field Summary

      Fields 
      Modifier and Type Field and Description
      static String CLUSTER_HOST
      Config String property: "cluster.host"
      The cluster host URL used for SSH and SCP connections.
      protected static String EMAIL_ENCRYPTED_PASSWORD
      Config String property: "mail.encryptedPassword"
      The Base 64 encrypted password is stored in the Config file using this property.
      protected static String EMAIL_FROM
      Config String property: "mail.from"
      Admin email address used to send user pipeline notifications.
      protected static String EMAIL_HOST
      Config String property: "mail.smtp.host"
      Session SMTP host
      protected static String EMAIL_PORT
      Config Integer property: "mail.smtp.port"
      Session SMTP port
      protected static String EMAIL_SMTP_AUTH
      Config Boolean property: "mail.smtp.auth"
      Session SMTP authorization flag, set to "Y" if required by "mail.smtp.host"
      protected static String EMAIL_START_TLS_ENABLE
      Config Boolean property: "mail.smtp.starttls.enable"
      Session SMTP TLS enable flag, set to "Y" if required by "mail.smtp.host"
      protected static String EMAIL_TO
      Config List property: "mail.to" This property defines the email recipients

    • Method Detail

      • checkDependencies

        public void checkDependencies()
                       throws Exception
        Verify required email Config properties exist and are properly formatted.
        1. Require Config.EMAIL_HOST
        2. Require Config.EMAIL_PORT
        3. Require Config.EMAIL_SMTP_AUTH
        4. Require Config.EMAIL_START_TLS_ENABLE
        5. Require Config.EMAIL_ENCRYPTED_PASSWORD
        6. Require Config.EMAIL_FROM is a valid email address
        7. Require Config.EMAIL_TO is a valid email address
        Specified by:
        checkDependencies in interface BioModule
        Specified by:
        checkDependencies in class BioModuleImpl
        Throws:
        Exception - thrown if missing or invalid dependencies are found

      • executeTask

        public void executeTask()
                 throws Exception
        Set status member variable and send email pipeline summary to email addresses listed in: Config."mail.to"
        Specified by:

        Specified by:

        Throws:
